page.title: 09LIFE IN 85 QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: Parents were asked for their views on Life in 1985.They see violence as Society's greatest problem with aggressive behaviour,hooliganism, mugging and vandalism spoiling people's lives.The causes are probably lack of parental control,general lack of discipline,disrespect for law,order & authority,& frustration at long-term unemployment.The possibility of unemployment after leaving school gives youngsters less incentive to work hard at school.Moral standards are declining manners are worsening & people are becoming more materialistic.There seems to be a greater interest in personal financial gain & assets,than in other peoples feelings.Public & community sprit,friendliness & sociability are fast disappearing.Marriages are breaking down because of selfishness & little thought for the children.
